desc: Village Thrive is an eco-conscious brand selling handcrafted home goods, made from natural materials such as rattan, coffee wood, and organic cotton. All for the modern, cultured home. #Bali, Rattan, Home Goods, Handmade, Bohemian Decor, Natural Materials

layout.text: Ethically Made, Sustainably Sourced, Handcrafted Goods.
